Title: Setting Up a Xiaohongshu Account
Content: Setting up a Xiaohongshu account is straightforward. Personal accounts can be registered with just a phone number and do not require real-name verification unless you plan to make payments. However, it is recommended to verify your account, especially if you are setting up a business account. Business accounts require a business license, and one license can be used to verify up to three business accounts. Each account can open a store, but it is crucial to verify the account as a professional account before opening the store to avoid complications. Business accounts have several advantages, including the ability to send more private messages daily and access to promotional tools like the 'JuGuang' platform. To maintain a white-list status on JuGuang, you need to spend a certain amount regularly. Initially, you need to deposit a specific amount, and subsequent accounts require lower deposits. Regular spending ensures you remain on the white-list, which is essential for effective promotions.

Title: Benefits of Business Accounts
Content: Business accounts on Xiaohongshu offer several benefits over personal accounts. Firstly, business accounts can post marketing notes without being flagged for violations, which is crucial for maintaining a good standing on the platform. Secondly, business accounts can send up to twenty private messages per day, compared to only five for personal accounts. This increased messaging capacity is beneficial for customer engagement and support. Thirdly, business accounts have access to the 'JuGuang' promotion platform, which allows for more effective advertising and visibility. Maintaining a white-list status on JuGuang requires regular spending, but it ensures that your promotions are prioritized. Additionally, business accounts are less likely to be penalized for external traffic redirection, provided the activity is within reasonable limits. These advantages make business accounts a better choice for serious sellers looking to maximize their reach and effectiveness on Xiaohongshu.

Title: Strategies for Managing Multiple Accounts
Content: Managing multiple accounts on Xiaohongshu can be highly effective, especially for businesses in niche markets. The primary reason for using multiple accounts is to increase the chances of content visibility and engagement. Each account can target different segments of your audience, ensuring broader coverage. Additionally, the platform's algorithm tests content with initial exposure, and having multiple accounts increases the likelihood of some content performing well. This strategy also mitigates the risk of account suspension or penalties, as issues with one account won't affect the others. For businesses, it's essential to balance the number of accounts with the team's capacity to manage them effectively. Using a matrix approach, where each account focuses on specific content types or audience segments, can optimize performance. Regularly updating and engaging with each account ensures sustained growth and visibility. This approach requires careful planning and consistent execution but can significantly enhance your presence on Xiaohongshu.
